sys_remote_update_set.description: This Update Set will cover the following JIRAs together. 1. SB-725 - Combined - Requested By and - Requested For notifications to one per each status for NOTIF01, 02 and 04. 2. SB-674 - Updated Business Rule for sc_req_item table to enqued the event once when Requested By is eqaul to Requested For 3. SB-885 - Updated the HTML Content of NOTIF02 and NOTIF04 to include missing item on the first line. 4. SB-656 - Removed all inline css rule on all 9 SR Notifications. 5. SB-829 - Renamed all notifications to utlize a full 120 max length for 13 Notifications 6. SB-655 - Updated HTML Content of NOTIF01, 02, 04 to remove the extra space after Self-Serve Portal, before the period. 7. SB-917 - Updated HTML Content of NOTIF06 to remove the 'Number' text that was listed twice. 8. SB-1015 - Updated HTML Content of NOTIF01, 02, 04 to use a second parameter of the event in Business Rule so that correct name appear on the notification. 9. SB-1017 - Updated Description field of 9 SR related Notifications 10. SB-1045 - Updated HTML Content of Notifications to remove extra space characters.
sys_remote_update_set.name: OCIO SR 2018 11 06 a

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_register_96368609db6d234050479eb6db961964

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description> Change to BCGOV-SR-NOTIF03 SR UPDATED. To fire Notif03 when changes are made to either the request, the RITM or the Task and the changes are made by someone other than the task Assigned to person. Changes include modifying the following fields: Work notes, Additional comments, Attachments, or a new call record being linked to an existing Request.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">work_notesVALCHANGES^ORcommentsVALCHANGES^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SC_task_P6_notification</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var updated_by=current.sys_updated_by;
	var cat_item = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
	cat_item.addQuery('request_item',current.sys_id);
	cat_item.query();
	while(cat_item.next())	
	{
		var parm1='';
		var parm2='';
		
		if(cat_item.assigned_to.user_name !=updated_by){
			gs.eventQueue("SC_request_Notification_P6", cat_item, parm1, parm2);
		}
	}
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-22 15:25:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SC_task_P6_notification</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-05 22:44:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_487c0901dbe9234050479eb6db961998
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>This Business rule is to trigger system email notification, BCGOV-SR-NOTIF01 Service Request Opened (Requestor), when a request is created(Opened) to sc_req_item.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKE4deda47edb1113003d1dd001cf9619b2^cat_item.sc_catalogsNOT LIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="4deda47edb1113003d1dd001cf9619b2"/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="NOT LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.inserted.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Add the events for the SR Notifications
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-674 1-Nov-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
		
	// Only send one notification to BY when BY and FOR are the same
	if (current.variables.u_notify_req_for == 'true'
		&& current.variables.u_notify_me == 'true'
		&& current.variables.u_requested_for == current.variables.u_requested_by) {
			gs.eventQueue("OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.inserted.notify", 
						  current, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by.first_name);		
	} else {
		// Notify to -FOR
		if((current.variables.u_notify_req_for == 'true')){
			gs.eventQueue("OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.inserted.notify", 
						  current, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_for, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_for.first_name);
		}
		// Notify to -BY
		if((current.variables.u_notify_me == 'true')
			&& (current.variables.u_requested_for != current.variables.u_requested_by)){
			gs.eventQueue("OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.inserted.notify", 
						  current, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by.first_name);
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-01 16:18:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>487c0901dbe9234050479eb6db961998</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.inserted.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_487c0901dbe9234050479eb6db961998</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-05 22:43:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=487c0901dbe9234050479eb6db961998"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_d0cb768adb996b0050479eb6db961976
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetrueb69d02137f232200ee2e108c3ffa9142sc_req_itemstate=4^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQtext/htmlNotification to the Requested by and/or the Requested for, as recorded on the Request Item. A notification is always sent to the requested by, regardless of whether or not they have selected the 'notify me' option. Note that we are only doing this for the Requested by. the Requested for will continue to only get the notification if they have asked for it. This notification is sent when a Request Item/Task state is changed to 'Closed Incomplete'. This happens when the Service request item is not fulfilled. 

 

]]>falseSC_request.closed.notify_CSCtruefalsefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1false${event.parm2}, Service Request Item ${number} has been Closed Incomplete: ${mail_script:callrecord.short_description}

Close notes: ${close_notes}

Request Number: ${request.number}
Request Item Number: ${number}
Requested For: ${u_item_requested_for.first_name} ${u_item_requested_for.last_name}
Requested By: ${u_item_requested_by.first_name} ${u_item_requested_by.last_name}

For updates on your Service Request please contact the Customer Service Centre at (250)387-7000 option 3 or via email at cschelp@gov.bc.ca.

Please do not reply, this is an auto-generated message.

 

]]>BCGOV-SR-NOTIF09 CSC Service Request Closed Incomplete (Requestor)true100falsefalse

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>
This Business rule is to trigger system email notification when a request is created(Opened), closed complete and closed incomple. </description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR SC_request.inserted.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	if((current.variables.u_notify_req_for == "true")){	
		gs.eventQueue("SC_request.inserted.notify_CSC", current, current.variables.u_requested_for, current.variables.u_requested_for.first_name);
	}
	
	if((current.variables.u_notify_me == "true") && (current.variables.u_requested_for != current.variables.u_requested_by)){
		gs.eventQueue("SC_request.inserted.notify_CSC", current, current.variables.u_requested_by, current.variables.u_requested_by.first_name);
		
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-18 20:50:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR SC_request.inserted.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-05 22:45:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2a280209db6d234050479eb6db961958
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>This Business rule is to trigger the following system email notifications, (1) BCGOV-SR-NOTIF02 Service Request Closed Complete (Requestor) and (2) BCGOV-SR-NOTIF04 Service Request Closed Incomplete (Requestor), when a request for a non P6 catalog item is closed completly or incompletely to sc_req_item.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">stateCHANGESTO3^ORstateCHANGESTO4^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKE4deda47edb1113003d1dd001cf9619b2^cat_item.sc_catalogsNOT LIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="4"/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="4deda47edb1113003d1dd001cf9619b2"/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="NOT LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.closed.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Add the events for the SR Notifications
 *
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-674 1-Nov-2018  Munhwan Gim      Initial implementation
 *
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 **/
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
		
	// Only send one notification to BY when BY and FOR are the same
	if (current.variables.u_notify_req_for == 'true'
		&& current.variables.u_notify_me == 'true'
		&& current.variables.u_requested_for == current.variables.u_requested_by) {
			gs.eventQueue("OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.closed.notify", 
						  current, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by.first_name);		
	} else {
		// Notify to -FOR
		if((current.variables.u_notify_req_for == 'true')){
			gs.eventQueue("OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.closed.notify", 
						  current, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_for, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_for.first_name);
		}
		// Notify to -BY
		if((current.variables.u_notify_me == 'true')
			&& (current.variables.u_requested_for != current.variables.u_requested_by)){
			gs.eventQueue("OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.closed.notify", 
						  current, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by, 
						  current.variables.u_requested_by.first_name);
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MUNGIM</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-01 20:45:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2a280209db6d234050479eb6db961958</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO_SR_sc_req_item.closed.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2a280209db6d234050479eb6db961958</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-05 22:42:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2a280209db6d234050479eb6db961958"/></record_update>

${cat_item.short_description}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">commentsVALCHANGES^ORwork_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SC_task_notification</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var updated_by=current.sys_updated_by;
	
	var cat_item = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
	cat_item.addQuery('request_item',current.sys_id);
	cat_item.query();
	while(cat_item.next())	
	{
		var parm1='';
		var parm2=current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue();
		if(cat_item.assigned_to.user_name !=updated_by){
			
			gs.eventQueue("SC-task_notification_assignee", cat_item, parm1, parm2);
		}
	}
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-23 17:17:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SC_task_notification</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-05 22:44:00</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>
This Business rule is to trigger system email notification when a request is created(Opened), closed complete and closed incomple. </description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">stateCHANGESTO3^ORstateCHANGESTO4^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="4"/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR SC_request.closed.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	if((current.u_item_notify_requested_for == true)) {
		gs.eventQueue("SC_request.closed.notify_CSC", current, current.u_item_requested_for, current.u_item_requested_for.first_name);}
		
	if((current.u_item_notify_requested_by == true) && (current.u_item_requested_by != current.u_item_requested_for)) {
			gs.eventQueue("SC_request.closed.notify_CSC", current, current.u_item_requested_by, current.u_item_requested_by.first_name);		
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKO</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-24 00:50:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR SC_request.closed.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MUNGIM</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-05 22:46:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982"/></record_update>
